pages.text: This tab allows you to specify what artifacts you want to see in other tabs. You can select any ranks / sets / slots / stat types.$(br2)Artifacts that meet at least one requirement of each filter categories will be displayed.$(br2)For stat types, both main stat type and sub stat types count. You can use sort tab to specify the orders.

When selected, the slot will be blue. When the slot is red, it means that there are no artifacts matching this requirement and all previous requirements.$(br2)You can also use the small blue and red buttons to select all or unselect all entries of a filter category.
